price: Onima kojima se – kada su im ljudi rekli: "Neprijatelji se okupljaju zbog vas, pa pazite ih se!" – vjerovanje povećalo, pa su kazali: "Nama je Allah dovoljan, a divan je On Zaštitnik."
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالَ لَهُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ قَدۡ جَمَعُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱخۡشَوۡهُمۡ فَزَادَهُمۡ إِيمَٰنٗا وَقَالُواْ حَسۡبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡوَكِيلُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna qāla lahumu al-nāsu inna al-nāsa qad jamaʿū lakum fa-ikh'shawhum fazādahum īmānan waqālū ḥasbunā al-lahu waniʿ'ma al-wakīlu
